Name: War Chariots
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with a Doru.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: This Formation may declare a charge in a turn in which it dashed. In addition, when this Formation completes a charge roll 3D6 for each model in this Formation. For each result of 5+ each enemy Formation within 1" of this Formation suffers 1 Ethereal Damage.
